ModMetaData.name: Annoying Life
ModMetaData.author: Gadjung
ModMetaData.description:
Because life without accidents is boring
Adds random accidents that usually happens in real life. During everyday life of pawn there is a random low chance he will get himself hurt, with special cases when he/she is mining/constructing/crafting/hauling/flicking or plant working. Should not be life-threatening except in some exceptionally rare occurrances.
